website_summaries.verdict: Pricey for a portable hoop, but its sturdy base and supports along with easy adjustability make up for the cost.
pros: Almost as sturdy as an in-ground model, barely wobbling if the backboard is struck
Height is easy and quick to adjust from a kids’ height to one for adult pickup games
cons: Net attachment welds may be prone to rust over time
Base’s shape can send a basketball rebounding in odd directions

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice basketball hoop (I use it constantly). There are two problems I have with it. One it's SUPER LOUD when you hit the rim. I feel like I wake up the whole neighborhood. Second if you swish the shot it hits off the bottom and flies away from you.
customer_reviews.author: PattyPooh

customer_reviews.title: Very great inaturcrions....
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was great on time and as described...The instructions were best I have seen on goals in this price range...puttung this goal together to about 2hrs with help of my son...would recommend just because of the ease of installation....the back board has a great bounce and is very sturdy...i like the feature of adding water to wheels and the base but need to add Rv antifreeze to keep the water from freezing when temps drop below 30...
customer_reviews.author: Heather Easterling

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well-built. Very smooth assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product. High quality construction. The instructions for assembly were amazingly good, down to individually labeled hardware pieces. There were two holes in the plastic base for support rods; be sure to use the one that goes through the metal base as shown in the instructions. It took me about 4 hours to assemble, by myself until the last steps. Had to buy a 16 mm ratchet socket; that size was not in my metric kit and it is essential.
customer_reviews.author: Shallee T. Page

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased so far!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't do a review unless there are things I think people should know, Pros: Fantastic instructions. I did it completely by myself in about 2 hours. Changing the height is easy It seems very sturdy to me. Very little wobble when the basketball bounces off the backboard or rim. I felt like the rebound was very close to what you'd get in the gym. Cons Moving it is a bit cumbersome but, I'm willing to make that trade off for the stability when shooting. Hint: If you're going to use a socket wrench, you'll need the long sockets. Size: 13mm, 16mm, and 17mm.
customer_reviews.author: miranda axsom

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performance and True Bounces
customer_reviews.text: We have had our Silverback NXT hoop for a couple of months and love it! It is very sturdy and has withstood strong winds without tipping. The hoop provides true bounces (and is even a little forgiving for shooters). The Silverback came with a reduced-price installation offer from Amazon, and the installer was great. The unit seems a lot more steady compared to the Lifetime model it was replacing. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop, but quality is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Well first I am not sure who can mount this thing in 90min for the first time :) Nevertheless the instructions were clear and the process pretty straight forward. The hoop itself is great, however the quality check is poor. One of the part had clearly a piece that was welded off center, making it impossible to adjust the hoop to all the possible heights. For that amount of money I was not expecting such flaw in the quality. I have requested a new part. Will see how it goes...
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Basketball standard
customer_reviews.text: I seldom write reviews, but this is a very good basketball standard. Very sturdy and solid, unlike some of those I've had in the past. Once its set where you want it to be, it's design is such that it won't be blown or tip over even under high winds. Its fairly easy to move and adjust too. Assembly was pretty easy, and took about as much time as advertised. There were a few times I had to put some muscle into it, and it's heavy enough that you'll probable want to have two adults and an adjustable latter on which to set the standard while you apply the backboard and hoop.
customer_reviews.author: mom.of.twins

customer_reviews.title: Great Basketball Hoop
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter basketball hoop if you don't want to invest in an in-ground one. Assembly is actually longer than 90 minutes for one person, but probably if you have two adults putting this together I can see it could be possible. Factoring the sorting and arranging of parts, give yourself half an afternoon, if not less time. The more prepared you are the better the assembly process. Instructions are very well written and assembly is truelly a breeze. We've been using it daily for the past two months. Simply fanstatic. Thanks again Silverback for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin

customer_reviews.title: Nice hoop but not portable once filled with water.
customer_reviews.text: So amazon installer came and put this thing together rather quick. He filled it with water and was on his way. I think tried to move the hoop because you know it’s a portable hoop right?? Wrong... whoever designed this thing and didn’t put a drain at the bottom should be fired . I emailed customer service and they told me just to tilt it to let the water out. I almost spit my coffee up. Other then that it’s a nice hoop just don’t plan on moving it once you fill it with water unless you have the back of a body builder.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews before buying this. It was very straightforward to assemble and tools about 90 minutes. The problem was that it wasn’t any more sturdy than any other portable goal I’ve had. The backboard wobbles when shooting. If you watch the video they are only showing layups rather than any real shots that have more impact. It is easier to move but still is difficult and requires two people. I wouldn’t buy this thinking that it will be any better than any other portable goal.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set up.
customer_reviews.text: Great set up. Base sits back far enough that you dont roll your ankle during layups. The only issue i have it the backboard is really flimsy. Away from the square it is pretty dead. Rim is exremely forgiving so probably not good for anyone working on a true jumper unless swishing everything is your goal. Overall its the best hoop Ive owned but the rim and backboard could be a little tighter/more responsive, especially for the price..
customer_reviews.author: K Yates

customer_reviews.title: The ABSOLUTE Best Portable Goal
customer_reviews.text: My son and I are absolutely thrilled with this goal! This really is a gym quality goal on wheels. A friend and I assembled in in about 2 hours. The instructions were easy to follow and we we shooting hoops before we knew it. The rim and backboard are solid and respond like you’d expect a gym goal to respond (the rebound is a little soft on the edges of the backboard, but nothing to be concerned about). The wheel barrow base makes is very easy to move around. The height adjustment is super easy as well. All in all, this is definitely an A+ system and I would wholehearted recommend this to ANYONE!
customer_reviews.author: Alex J. Onan

customer_reviews.title: Although it will be a nice set if it ever gets assembled
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandson. The assembly has been a nightmare. The wrong instructions and wrong parts were sent with the backboard set. My son-in-law finally contacted the manufacturer. Manufacturer rep requested pictures so they could send the right parts. Even instructions on the internet were incorrect. Although it will be a nice set if it ever gets assembled, I think someone from the company should come out to put it together for my family-given all the things wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were awesome, very thorough and easy to follow. Parts were labeled well both in the packing and relative to the step by step instructions. But, you need the proper tools and proper sockets; the instructions clearly tell you what you need. it does not install in 90 minutes....closer to about 3 hours, you will need a 2nd person to assemble the backboard. So far, it seems sturdy with play, it has a decent rebound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No dead spots solid backboard.
customer_reviews.text: Looked forever best price and best brand you will see when you see the pole size and design featerues like water goes in wheels side note, do half antifreeze for cold months so it won't freeze and maybe expand and crack.
customer_reviews.author: Mr me too

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with this purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this purchase so far. I decided to write a review mainly to echo what others have said about the assembly instructions, which are probably the best I've seen in a long time for any product of any type. Each step is very clear, illustrated, and easy to follow, yet not too verbose either.
customer_reviews.author: ericjak

customer_reviews.title: Best portable hoop 🏀 I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I love this company!!! Man, they did a great job on this hoop. I’ve been playing basketball for over 25 years, and I played a bit in college. I’ve used a lot of portable hoops over the years. When I decided to get one for the family to use, I wanted one I could put together without going crazy (in one day), something that looked good, would not fall over, and was sturdy. This Silverback hits the bill in every area. Can’t say enough on how much we love this hoop!!
customer_reviews.author: MPLS Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice hoop if you don't want an in ground.
customer_reviews.text: Hoop is great. Not as mobile as I had hoped but this is b/c of the weight needed to keep it stable. Still possible to move when needed. Little damage during shipping, bent tab on pole where paint is gone and rusted quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Stable, high quality, simple to assemble basketball hoop.
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this by myself in about 2hrs. The quality of the materials and instructions are excellent. Other than some minor fit issues (getting bolts passed through etc), I only needed an extra set of hands in one or two places. Having a 3 inch extender for the wrench when installing the hoop, although not essential. The backboard is forgiving as is the rim. The entire rig is stable even on the long shots. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rocketman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, family fun for a reasonable cost!
customer_reviews.text: Takes awhile to assemble, but not bad at all. Power tools help! This is a quality item, with good materials. It’s easy to adjust the height, even for an 8yr old female. Very sturdy compared to other portables. Predictably, it is also very heavy to move... Rebound isn’t up to the pro game, but neither are my kids. The price isn’t either, so it all kinda works. This got the kids off their screens, and that was the “goal” - forgive the pun. Mission accomplished!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully designed product with high-quality materials. I am an engineer and this exceeded my expectations. I love the height adjustment mechanism. The assembly instructions are very good and easy to follow, though, for an amateur it will take approx. 4 hours to assemble this. For the most part, 1 person can do it, only the backboard and raising the assembled hoop requires help. It would have been good to have a valve for draining the water from the stand for moving purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Devi Madhavan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this goal. You’ll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about how much we like this goal. We were stepping up from a 44” Spalding to the 54” silverback. The set up took about 90 min. Easy instructions. Backboard is firm and bounces true like glass. Extremely well built. They thought of everything. Thanks nxt!
customer_reviews.author: adam gatzemeier

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! This thing is amazingly sturdy. The assembly directions were well thought out and easy to follow. I assembled it by myself in maybe three hours. I highly recommend this quality product with simple, straight forward assembly.
customer_reviews.author: AugustaDoc

customer_reviews.title: Look at the rest but buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome hoop. I was shopping all the portable hoops...this one is expensive but well worth it. I wouldn’t plan on dunking or hanging on the rim but it’s great for shooting. I use it for shooting about 30-60 minutes a day 4-6 days a week. I’d advise adding a rebounder if your shooting alone. On makes there’s some pretty big ricochets. All in all it’s a really sweet rig and I’m super happy I purchased. Great delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: MATTY

customer_reviews.title: Loving it! Easy to assemble, but verify you've got the tools needed ahead of time!
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's great. Feels very sturdy and high quality, kids and I are all loving it. Assembly was easy and straightforward, I did it by myself except needed another hand for the rim. NOTE - if, like me, you don't have a 16mm socket with a 3" extension/clearance, buy one with this purchase to save a store trip like me! It's required to put the rim on.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Muntz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Assembly went smooth. Directions are very clear. Very sturdy unit but somewhat difficult to move once base is filled with water. Definitely a 2 person job. We've had some pretty strong wind storms lately and it has not been blown over.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Keeps falling over
customer_reviews.text: This hoop was easy to assemble with 2 people and it seems sturdy except that even with the base full of sand the wind too easily has knocked this over twice now. We keep laying it on its side when we aren't using it so it won't keep getting knocked over. The hoop is already broken due to the 2 falls it already had.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy easy to assemble great hoop
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son for Christmas, put it together in an hour and a half by myself and I’m no engineer, easy. Very sturdy very very solid hoop. Make sure you have a level surface and filled mine with water, don’t hear the water, feels like a real hoop. Now I play more than my son cuz he hates to lose and I will never let him win. Aside from the $1500 hoops you cement into the ground this baby is outstanding, way above expectations. Delivered on time no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces were mislabeled but looking at the instructions and what's been completed, it was not hard at all to figure out. Really not a challenge at all to put together myself, needing help only when putting on the backboard. Needed a socket I didn't own and borrowed from a neighbor. Product meets expectation and his used nearly every day. We love it as do the neighborhood children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. I only needed assistance while attaching the backboard and moving the hoop into position. It took me about 2 or so hours. The hoop is sturdy but a little forgiving (which is good for kids). Encourages them to play more. Im still yet to lose in a game of Pig since I installed the hoop. The manufacturer is a good company and was easy to deal with when I had a issue on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: MRob

customer_reviews.title: Well loved basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: Our old hoop finally "died." We bought this hoop as a replacement. My son is on the high school basketball team and this hoop gets some good workouts. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: BooksAreFriends

customer_reviews.title: Stable & Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for 2 months now. It is a very stable and solid product. Doesnt feel like the ones that raise up straight. It came with extremely well-organized instructions. Even includes some spares for comonly used screws/nuts/washers. However it definitely took me lot longer than 3 hours. Easy to move, manouver. There is some vibration on the board when you play, but I guess that is there in every portable hoop I guess
customer_reviews.author: Coolagiru

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Assembly Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Received our basketball hoop a couple days ago. Delivery was great and on time. I watched an assemble video prior to putting it together and it was helpful. The provided directions were spot on. Very easy, step by step. If you take your time and follow the directions you should have no problem. You will need a hand at times (my 14 year old helped) but most can be done with one person. It took us about 2 hours to assemble. The hoop is very sturdy and doesn’t seem to bounce with shots. This was very important to my 2 teenagers.
customer_reviews.author: Steve kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible QA - No Manufacturers Response
customer_reviews.text: The stickers for height and model number are upside down and the backboard has a defect. The QA on the product is terrible. I didnt notice the defect on the backboard until after assembly, quite disappointed. Will attempt to contact seller to resolve. Update: reached out to the manufacturer 3x and no response. Requested management call back, and still nada!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a full year.
customer_reviews.text: It was really mice for about 4 months. We’ve had this hoop for 8 months and it did not hold up. The adjustable lever stopped holding after about 4 months so we had to jam a stick in in order to hold position or else every time the ball hits the rim, it pops back down. The base started leaking making it easy for the wind to blow over if water is not put in base every day...even then a hard gust of wind will knock it over. The design is supposed to not tip but it still does. Disappointed that it didn’t even last a full year for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SStew

customer_reviews.title: Great Basketball Hoop!
customer_reviews.text: After plenty of research I chose this Basketball Hoop and it was well worth the back order wait. Instructions were step by step and very easily assembled. Only needed 2 people for 3 steps, spring, backboard, and rim attachments. Taking all products out of the box, keeping the labeled wrapping on them, and spreading them out helps make the assembly easier and faster. All holes were lined up correctly except for one. Just a slight modification fixed that. It’s extremely sturdy. The base bar underneath the plastic base helps tremendously. It will take 2 people to move it around safely.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Basketball goal.  Yes, longer than 90 mins
customer_reviews.text: With one person, the assembly took about four hours. The assembly was doable with one person but two people would make assembly easier since there are some large pieces. The instructions were really clear and detailed. The negative on the assembly was it required multiple sizes of wrenches and sockets. It would have been better if they had provided the wrenches in the kit. The goal is very hard to move around when it is full. It should not blow over easily.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Albright

customer_reviews.title: Great portable hoop.  Difficult operation.
customer_reviews.text: Very good portable backboard. However, operation of height adjustment is difficult and broke housing the first time it was used. Just not as smooth as other brands. Base also needs additional blocking underneath angled lever to prevent wind from tipping over, even with filled base.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Mom put it together!
customer_reviews.text: The goal is great. Looks so nice and has a great feel to it. Not a cheap or flimsy product! I was able to put it together by myself (41 year old fairly active Mom) for the most part - my 12 year old son helped with just a couple of steps. It took me 5 hours, but we stopped for snacks and lunch. I was also wrangling a 4 year old at the same time. I put one or 2 things on wrong and had to undo them - so lost maybe half an hour with that. I think it could have been done in 3 hours without distractions. :).
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: I honestly expected more after reading reviews. I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly expected more after reading reviews. I wish it was a bit more stable. The basket still moves a lot when you shoot. I guess nothing beats a fixed basket.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Been waiting for weeks for availability after the quarantine & pandemic got serious during March/April. Got this for my b baller and all I can say is diggity damn! Easy to put together. Took 1.5 hours to put together. Very sturdy and worth the money. Looks and feels better playing with as opposed to the competition. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, sturdy, and was fairly easy to put together. I was able to put it together with occasional assistance for the steps that were easier with 2 people. All parts were there. Only complaint was a couple of parts were mislabeled, so I had to cross reference the image with the label, but it was able to be figured out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the hoop
customer_reviews.text: This is the first hoop for us, and we're very happy. The instructions are extremely clear, include tips that are very helpful, and the parts packaging is well thought out. It took us longer to construct than the stated 90 minutes, but that was largely issues on our end. If you read the instructions beforehand and have the correct tools, I easily see this being the claimed 90 minutes or less to construct. It can mostly be done by a single person, but a couple of points do need a 2nd pair of hands. We've also had to move this around a few times and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: More stable than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Just putting it out there... the assembly is a pain... nothing easy to it. However, the basketball hoop is very stable, even for a portable product. The base and pole system is quite solid and very stable with very little motion or swaying. I definitely recommend this product, but just be prepared to exert quite a bit of effort when assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: DixieLambs

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: Quality is top notch. Has a nice touch off the backboard. Not difficult to install but you definitely need two people. Don’t do it alone. It’s not safe. I’m very happy with the purchase. It’s easy to lower and raise for an able adult. It feels like it’ll last me 10-15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Dan24

customer_reviews.title: Good instructions, but a couple of parts were mis-labeled
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions, but a couple of parts were mis-labeled. Made the assembly process take a bit longer. Well built, solid system.
customer_reviews.author: CycloneFan

customer_reviews.title: Great Goal
customer_reviews.text: This took a short 3 hours to assemble. My 9 year old is super pumped. This high quality goal should last for a while. I was planning on being able to put it in my garage when it storms. (We like in Oklahoma) I don’t think we are going to be able to do that because of how the wheels are positioned.
customer_reviews.author: TimothyBezenah

customer_reviews.title: Game On
customer_reviews.text: Built solid......rim and backboard doesn’t look like it’s going to fall over if ya miss it . Lol Easy to adjust and move around . Had the Amazon Install and it was totally worth it. Saw some other lifetime models and Spalding....if you are not doing the ground-post install.....this unit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: downtowncasper

customer_reviews.title: Best portable system I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Best portable system I've owned. We've had both Spaldings and Lifetimes, and this is light years ahead of any of those, at any price. Worth the extra money. Very stable. Quality components. Clear assembly instructions, but definitely requires two people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking hoop, easy assembly minus 2 steps
customer_reviews.text: Needed a second person to help with two parts of the assembly (attaching backboard with the hitch pins and the two brace poles into the base) but other than that was able to complete assembly in a few hours. Took a while to fill the base with sand due to the design of the base. Used about 5 bags (250lbs). Additional 3 bags on the outside. Nice looking hoop already got some compliments on it. Love the big wheels made it easy to move around. Polycarbonate backboard is better than most lifetime backboards I've use but still not comparable to glass. Overall loving it so far
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy nice  backboard
customer_reviews.text: Great backboard, sturdy , not too hard to put together but ideally you need two people. I did by myself. I have had it for 2 months now without any issues. The clear backboard looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Hkn

customer_reviews.title: 2 years old and like new!
customer_reviews.text: 2 years old and still looks and acts new. This has been a great hoop. We’ve got young boys, so nothing to crazy on it (unless I play, then I hang all over it). Backboard is still crystal clear, nice spring to the rim, even the net is holding up well. The mechanism to adjust is still working perfect. I have zero complaints! Decent investment investment, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable hoop.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly painless to assemble as long as you have an extra set of hands for a couple steps. Directions and packaging were top notch. Filled the base and wheels with basegel and water and the hoop is very stable. Adjusting the height of the basket is extremely easy. Only gripe would be that there isn't much of a rebound off of the backboard, but that was expected with a polycarbonate board. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Jacklin

customer_reviews.title: Best BB hoop and Good Directions- need higher Suppprt than recommended 4 Ft
customer_reviews.text: I had assembled the competitor basketball system 10 years ago, directions were awful and this was great and easy. I’m 65 Engr and female and needed my daughter to help hold pieces in line for bolts, and then strong young man to help for the last phase attaching the backboard (54”) and hoop. Recommend higher than 4 ft stand to rest pole and strong second person! Heavy and takes 30 minutes if fast.id like advise n my filling base with water if no dunking and 5’2” kids using it? We didn’t fill it to ease in moving and it appears very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and stylish. My son and his friends love it. Can be moved around if you have the weight and strength to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Kenfre

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THE BASKETBALL HOOP FOR MY GRANDSONS BIRTHDAY.HE WAS SO EXCITED HE COULDNT WAIT YO USE IT.MY SON PUT IT TOGETHER IN ABOUT 30 MINUTES TO AN HR. DEFINATELY WOULD RECOMMEND THIS
customer_reviews.author: Darlene schissler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this goal for my 14 and 10 year old sons. For the price, I was amazed at how sturdy this piece of equipment was. It did take around 2 hours to assemble, but the instructions are incredibly well put together and easy to follow. You will need 2 people for some of the assembly, but my 10 year old was more than enough for most of it. A little bulky to move around, and don't plan on storing it in a standard garage as it is too tall even on the lowest rim setting. Still, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Baer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson. Sturdy and even impressed my son-in-law. He assembled the goal and is an aircraft stress engineer. Expensive, but appears to be a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Michael_Mc

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you have plenty of time to put this together!
customer_reviews.text: It took two of us 3 hours to put this together and it had SO MANY pieces! I gave it four stars because of the difficulty in putting it together. My grandson is loving it and is outside every day (weather permitting) with his friends. It's been a good buy and I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: MaimonW

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the quality of this adjustable basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. There were four of us working as a team and the extra sets of hands were helpful. All the nuts and bolts were labeled and organized and instructions well written. Very pleased with the quality of this adjustable basketball hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Ramanda

customer_reviews.title: Great goal, noticed scratch on back board
customer_reviews.text: Great goal, a lot of money for the back board to be scratched. Did not notice until it was assembled, and I pulled plastic covering off. Waiting on customer service to let me know what they will do about that. Will update shortly. Otherwise 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: joe whaley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and better than other portables I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.text: Priced a little more than most other portables. The quality shows— Super sturdy and as close as you’ll get to an in ground without being one. I paid $99 for the Amazon installation service. It took them about an hour when it would have taken me > 2 hours and would have needed an adult helper. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Rich - Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: great value, clean look, sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.text: we had our last hoop for almost 20 years until the backboard broke. It has plastic base, it was not very sturdy, so the hoop would shake a lot. this hoop is tight! the frame sits below the plastic weight making it very sturdy. we are really enjoying it and happy with the purchase so far. only complaint would be the ball often hitting the base after a clean made basket - but that can happen to many of the portal units.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great system and great price
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were very clear and easy to follow, but it took us about 3 hours to assemble. The system is very sturdy and strong, and great for my teen boys and their friends. Adjusting the height is easy, and the clear backboard better blends in with the trees, instead of standing out. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steffanie

customer_reviews.title: Love the Hoop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughters and they love it. Very sturdy and having the height adjustment is great for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Not wroth to buy it
customer_reviews.text: We bought the hoop 2018 and my son at that time was only 3 years old. We barely used it and this spring when we put the hoop out and it looks so funny. Check the picture. It’s not worth the money and we also had their assemble service and he wasn’t friendly either.
customer_reviews.author: Blue sea

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this portable basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a great mid-level basketball hoop, this one fits the bill in every way. The instructions were clear and well written, it made assembly a breeze. The hoop is very sturdy, easy to adjust, and moves easily to wherever you want it. Highly recommend this hoop if you’re shopping for one in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Impression
customer_reviews.text: My husband put the basketball court up by himself...took him 5 hours but it's done. Looks nice. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Good instructions but some parts damaged
customer_reviews.text: Hoop took two of us 4 hours to put together but the directions were very clear which was helpful. However, the back board had all sorts of scratches and scuffs (some shown above) and the spring on the height adjustment piece was not on and it was a pain putting that back on
customer_reviews.author: JM1112

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service/support!!
customer_reviews.text: MISSING PARTS!!!!! Ordered in April, received in May Missing axle rod, spoke to customer service, said part was not gonna arrive until mid July! Now august 1 STILL NO PART!! So much for my daughter’s birthday gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome potable hoop
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to follow instructions. Putting the backboard together requires a two person team. My children and I love it
customer_reviews.author: C. Anazco

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy so far with it. It is also easy enough to adjust the height. So far no complaints at all. Glad we got it for the kids. I think the backboard feel is a little different than the in ground hoop I grew up with but I don't think it is a bad thing. It is not too loud either. All in all very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: dgriffith

customer_reviews.title: Details
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing, the shipping sucked. Wow, they called me to find out what I purchased and if I knew what the UPN was.
customer_reviews.author: Eiskrypta

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised. Keep in mind this is portable and not secured.
customer_reviews.author: Cdw

customer_reviews.title: Great portable hoop
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to adjust. Sturdy when filled with water or sand. Great customer service when we had an issue with our rim. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TLH

customer_reviews.title: Solid Goal that is easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best portable basketball goal we have ever had. The backboard is solid, the height adjustment is effortless, and the base stability is second to none based upon the way the ballast sits upon a frame, I have no concerns of this goal falling over as I have seen neighbors' goals do (of a different brand). Best of all -- the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Curry

customer_reviews.title: Epic failure
customer_reviews.text: The base was not manufactured correctly and had to be returned. Don’t waste your time. Also delivery, installation and return were (and still are) logistical failures. Ruined Christmas present for the kids. Would not buy sports equipment and installation from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: great purchase for the cost, kids love it and it is a nice looking goal as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Goal
customer_reviews.text: Solid basketball goal, the instructions were well laid out and the hardware was all numbered. You definitely need another person to help at the end when attaching the backboard to the goal post. Me and my son have been using it for ~2 months now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyD

customer_reviews.title: Backboard prone to warping if it tips over due to design.
customer_reviews.text: The base was filled per the instructions and the basketball hoop blew over. Giving this two stars because the design of the backboard is not sturdy enough to avoid warping if it tips over. The backboard is permanently warped now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop
customer_reviews.text: The product exceeds my expectations for a portable hoop. It is easily adjustable and moved, and seems solid and durable. Included Amazon assembly service made this a compelling purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Good mid-level system. Sturdy and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice and sturdy once together. 12 year old loves it. Really need 2 people to put together safely, and more quickly. Took a couple hours by myself. And a few moments of crossed fingers that the system would not crash down on me. Also a bit difficult to move after base is filled. Make sure you have it close to where you want it placed before filling.
customer_reviews.author: James F Wilkie II

customer_reviews.title: Box was delivered with a large hole in it
customer_reviews.text: I have not had time to put it together so I will do another review after that, but it was delivered with a large hole in it. Not sure if anything is damaged yet but not super happy about the box condition when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Abplanalp

customer_reviews.title: A really nice goal. The backboard is a lot more solid ...
customer_reviews.text: A really nice goal. The backboard is a lot more solid and doesn’t have as much bounce as our older cheaper one. I would’ve given it 5 stars but it came with the wrong directions which made assembly a little more challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: The goal was very easy to assemble, instructions were clear. Told you what tools you need, what parts. I assembled by myself in about 2.5 hours. We have not played much on it yet because it's for a birthday, but the goal is very sturdy and seems to have quality parts.
customer_reviews.author: mark thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good hoop. Assembly took about 4 hours with lunch break. Not too difficult. Make sure you have all the needed sizes for sockets. Looks great once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Feigelson

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Great assembly instructions although it took longer than 90 min to put together. Very sturdy and fun to shoot on. Easy to adjust height for different skill levels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Service
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is great. Don’t break the adjustment actuator or you’ll be waiting for years to get a replacement part from China.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Broken Backboard "Shipping"
customer_reviews.text: Basketball hoop is good quality, but backboard was broken. Didn't notice until Christmas Eve night and had to have it up for the boy. Chalk it up to crap happens during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Buddles

customer_reviews.title: Waited 3 months and then unable to assemble due to missing part!
customer_reviews.text: It's taken longer than 90 mins to assemble. Definitely doable, but it's frustrating to wait 3 months and then while assembling, you find they gave you the wrong parts. Directions show I need 4 nylon washers, but I'm given 2 metal washers. Now we have to wait even longer!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took about 4 hours to assemble, but once together this is very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Busser

customer_reviews.title: So much easier to assemble and I couldn't be more pleased with the quality and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking at cheaper options, spend the extra money on this unit! So much easier to assemble and I couldn't be more pleased with the quality and ease of use. Great hoop!
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Hoops
customer_reviews.text: Beast of a portable basketball hoop, love it, very tough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and as expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as expected. Bought as a gift and had it shipped. They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R C

customer_reviews.title: A great basketball racks
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking basketball rack. Kids love to play ball now.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is great! Was up and ready to be used quickly. My son dunks on it and it is very sturdy . Definitely worth the money spent !
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Best Basketball Court
customer_reviews.text: Son love his court easy to put together and easy to move worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Andre Jamal Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bad mama jama
customer_reviews.text: This is one bad a&& hoop. Looks great and well built. Assembly had minor challenges but two people gets it done.
customer_reviews.author: SemperFi86

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Solid, sturdy and I never had to fill the base. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Desertrat

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: The game is on now! Feels like the real deal!!!! Better performance and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.author: Sandhya Rao

product_meta.title: Silverback NXT Portable Height-Adjustable Basketball Hoop Assembles in 90 Minutes
product_meta.description: The Silverback NXT is pushing the envelope for portable basketball hoops. The advanced technology and strategic engineering of this goal makes for faster assembly, improved rebound, superior strength, unmatched stability, and effortless transportability. Compare the features of the Silverback NXT to other portable goals on the market, and you will see why this hoop is the next big thing in portable basketball hoops. - Stabili-Frame – The Silverback NXT features Stabili-Frame technology, creating unmatched stability for increased playability and added safety. The slanted pole design was engineered to offer even weight distribution across the entire base. Unlike competitor goals, the pole directly connects to the steel frame below the base, increasing the integrity of the structure. Compare to most portable hoops that utilize the blow molded base as a support structure – which is typically the first piece that fails. The shape of the base and the weighted ballast wheels create an optimal center of gravity, ensuring your goal will stay upright. Infinity Edge Backboard - Unlike traditional backboards that are framed by a plastic or metal edge, the Silverback NXT features an Infinity Edge Backboard with edges that wrap around to the back of the backboard as one continuous material. This design not only creates the modern, clean look of the hoop, but, more importantly, gives the backboard unmatched strength – greatly reducing “dead" spots in the backboard that are common among portable hoops. This technique, folds the edges of the material backward, creating a stronger face for superior rebound. Ergo-Move - The sloped base design on the Silverback NXT creates a completely unique weight distribution that allows the goal to be moved by two people with much greater ease than traditional portable basketball goals. This design enables the goal to be tilted backward onto its large weighted wheels, relieving much of the weight that a person must support, similar to the engineering of a wheelbarrow. The hoop is then easily rolled to its new location while the rear kickstand prevents the goal from tipping over. Quick-Play - No one likes long assembly projects, so the Silverback NXT was designed to make assembly as simple as possible. The NXT comes partially assembled with attached hardware, so you simply attach the major pieces using only a few required tools. The NXT allows you to assemble your goal in approximately 90 minutes, so you can start playing.
feature_bullets: ULTIMATE STRENGTH AND STABILITY - Stabili-Frame steel-on-steel connection between steel chassis and main pole
INCREASED REBOUND - Infinity Edge Backboard that folds backward for increased rigidity
EASILY MOVE THE GOAL - ErgoMove wheel-barrow design for an easy lift-and-roll action
ULTRA-FAST ASSEMBLY - Assembles in 90-minutes or less with Quick-Play design and preassembled parts
HEIGHT-ADJUSTABLE - 7.5’ to 10' height adjustability (in 6" increments) and 26" overhang under the goal
